children.label: Dowling Parking Garage
children.more: There is plenty of parking available in the University's main parking garage on Boston Avenue. Visitors must purchase a token ($5.00) to exit the garage. The entrances to the garage are from North Hill Road and from Boston Avenue. The garage is open from 6:00 AM to 12 midnight and closed on holidays and weekends. Overnight parking is not allowed in the garage.

children.label: 80 George Street Parking Lot
children.more: There are a limited number of visitor and handicap parking slots at 80 George St.  All remaining parking requires a faculty/staff sticker or guest pass. Due to an agreement between Tufts and the City of Medford, Tufts employees are not permitted to park on the streets surrounding the building. Please use a Tufts lot.

children.label: Aidekman Arts Center Parking Lot 1
children.restriction: Parking is restricted to faculty/staff, commuter and vehicles with a guest pass only. Stickers are required.

children.label: Cousens Parking Lot
children.restriction: Guest pass, faculty/staff, commuter, resident, and sophomore. Stickers are required.

children.label: Dowling Parking Garage
children.more: There is plenty of parking available in the University's main parking garage on Boston Avenue. Visitors must purchase a token ($5.00) to exit the garage. The entrances to the garage are from North Hill Road and from Boston Avenue. The garage is open from 6:00 AM to 12 midnight and closed on holidays and weekends. Overnight parking is not allowed in the garage.

children.label: Eliot Pearson Parking Lot
children.restriction: A guest pass or faculty/staff sticker is required.

children.label: TAB Parking Lot
children.more: TAB faculty/staff sticker required. Parking in the TAB lot is reserved for special faculty/staff TAB Parking stickers.  All other parking is prohibited. There are some metered parking spots along the adjacent street.
